description: Very professional. Rater install from their site, much newer version. Go to manager.io

Have been using the desktop edition in my sole proprietorship for four years. It is frequently updated and well supported. Many many features for almost any business type. I have no accounting background, but it has guided me to keeping records to norms.
Excellent Accounting Software. Fully featured. If you require an Open Source accounting package, this is the one to use.
